item.title: Interview Fundies: Longest Prefix Match
item.description: Given Given the following simplified IPv4 route table: Network Netmask Gateway ------------ ------------- ----------- 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 172.16.1.10 10.0.0.0 255.0.0.0 172.16.1.20 10.0.0.0 255.255.255.0 172.16.1.30 10.128.0.0 255.252.0.0 172.16.1.40 10.128.0.0 255.255.0.0 172.16.1.50 10.128.132.0 255.255.254.0 172.16.1.60 Question To reach 8.8.8.8 what gateway will be chosen? To reach 10.128.0.10 what gateway will be chosen? To reach 10.128.134.52 what gateway will be chosen? What is the longest prefix in the table? What is the shortest prefix in the table?

item.title: They Call Her LINA
